details.script_functionality: The script uses Slurm to submit a series of jobs, each running an R script called 'wfMetrics.R' on a *volt.csv file. Each job runs on one core, has a runtime of 10 minutes, uses the 'short' partition, requires 1GB of memory, and sends an email if the job fails.
details.R_script_arguments: The wfMetrics.R script takes three arguments: the input *volt.csv file, the output file name with the SD appended, and the output file name with the time appended.
